title: Coronavirus update: Global cases pass 2 million, Morrison 'puzzled' by WHO backing of wet markets
description: New York's daily death toll goes flat at a "horrific level", the Federal Government calls WHO's backing of wet markets "unfathomable", and Donald Trump says he won't fire his top expert.
content:
Updated 
April 14, 2020 13:30:13
New York's death toll has risen above 10,000 as global cases reach 2 million, France has extended its lockdown until May, and Donald Trump says he won't fire his top expert on infectious diseases.
